articles.author: Ellise Shafer
articles.title: ‘The Apprentice’ Director Offers to Screen Movie for Donald Trump After Campaign Threatens Lawsuit: ‘I Don’t Necessarily Think It’s a Movie He Would Dislike’ - Variety
articles.description: "The Apprentice" director Ali Abbasi has responded to the Trump campaign's threat to sue over the movie.
articles.content:
“The Apprentice” director Ali Abbasi has responded to the Trump campaign’s threat to sue over the movie, which premiered at Cannes Film Festival on Monday night.
